attributes.action: make the sure start maternity grant avaliable to all mothers regardless of earnings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's hard enough preparing for a newborn baby.  I think the sure start grant for £500.00 should be avaliable to all mothers not just mothers on IS, JS or higher rate WFTC.  During my pregnancy my husband wasn't working and was finding it hard to find a new job because we was married we got a couple of pounds a week TC because I was told I had to support him.  We had so many bill and  a loan and it felt like as soon as I worked all our money was gone.  There is alot of families in this situation and the sure start maternity grant could help a baby get the right start in life.  If a family doesn't have money to get the essentials like nappies and milk it's the child that will suffer.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make the sure start maternity grant avaliable to all mothers regardless of earnings."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11732.asp

Prime Minister's Office
